name: N/P Concentrations (surrogates)
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Nutrients near natural/guidelines unless higher levels are normal (e.g., blackwater).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Grab sample lab TN/TP or colorimetric

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: TN > 1.5 mg/L or TP > 0.10 mg/L.
Criteria: Strong enrichment

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: TN ~1.0-1.5 mg/L or TP ~0.075-0.10 mg/L.
Criteria: Marked elevation

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: TN ~0.7-1.0 mg/L or TP ~0.05-0.075 mg/L.
Criteria: Slightly elevated nutrients

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: TN ~0.5 mg/L and TP ~0.03 mg/L.
Criteria: Near low to moderate trophic benchmarks
